name: Kuron and the Jelly Islands
description:
A simple action physics puzzle game where the black cat 's "Kuron" is active!

Easy operation, easy rules, content that is impressive, anyone can enjoy!

· Over 70 levels

· Online battle mode

· Beautiful graphics

· Photo filter function to convert photos to beautiful sunsets photo
